name: Block Fit 3D
description:
BlockFit 3D is a new Puzzle game with a colorful tetris-style gameplay.
Easy to play at first, it becomes more & more challenging level after level!

How far will you go?

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the empty spaces
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Absolutely no time limit!

FEATURES
- Sweet 3D graphics
- Smooth & Colorful effects
- Easy & Quick gameplay
- Tons of unique puzzles!
